      • isExtBundleCompatabilityMode

        public static boolean isExtBundleCompatabilityMode()
        This method is used to return the value of the variable extBundleCompatabilityMode which indicates if the platform-ext bundle files should be loaded or not. true if system property 'extbundlecompatabilitymode' is set to true OR setExtBundleCompatabilityMode(boolean) is called with parameter true. true indicates only the Ext language pack files would be loaded while false(default) would load the platform-ext bundle files after Ext language pack files thereby overriding them.

      • setExtBundleCompatabilityMode

        public static void setExtBundleCompatabilityMode(boolean mode)
        This Method will be used to set the extBundleCompatabilityMode mode

      • registerExtJSBTarget

        public static void registerExtJSBTarget(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        This method reads /ext/source/ext.jsb and creates a new document with one target ('Everything'), copied form this file. The document is then registered with JSB manager. context

      • discoverResource

        public static java.lang.String discoverResource(java.lang.String path,
                                                SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method returns localized path for any given path based on user locale.
        Localized file is looked under following directories -
        • /localization/[language]/[country]/[/variant]/[path]
        • /localization/[language]/[country]/[path]
        • /localization/[language]/[path]
        If not found; default locale ISCUILocale#getDefaultSystemLocale() is used to discover the file. If a file is found, the path is returned else original path is returned. Any returned value will start with a "/", and all "\" will be replaced to "/". This is true even if original path is returned. If not in dev mode; this method caches the discovered file name, and used the same entry for subsequent calls. path uiContext discovered localized path of type String

      • discoverResource

        public static java.lang.String discoverResource(java.lang.String path,
                                                SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                com.ibm.icu.util.ULocale lc)
        This method returns localized path for any given path based on passed locale. If locale is null, user locale is used instead.
        Localized file is looked under following directories -
        • /localization/[language]/[country]/[/variant]/[path]
        • /localization/[language]/[country]/[path]
        • /localization/[language]/[path]
        If not found; default locale ISCUILocale#getDefaultSystemLocale() is used to discover the file. If a file is found, the path is returned else original path is returned. Any returned value will start with a "/", and all "\" will be replaced to "/". This is true even if original path is returned. If not in dev mode; this method caches the discovered file name, and used the same entry for subsequent calls. path uiContext lc If null, user locale is used. discovered localized path of type String

      • resourceExists

        public static boolean resourceExists(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Checks whether a given resource exists or not. fileName servletContext true if resource exists, false if does not.

      • getLocalizedFile

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedFile(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                java.lang.String suffix,
                                                com.ibm.icu.util.ULocale locale,
                                                SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method finds file for file based localization. In case of file based localization, following files are looked for -
        • path[language]_[country]_[variant][suffix]
        • path[language]_[country][suffix]
        • path[language][suffix]
        This method returns null if no localized file is found for passed locale. prefix File name without suffix suffix Extension of the file. locale uiContext localized file

      • getBundleFor

        public static java.lang.String getBundleFor(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                            java.lang.String name)
        This method returns the full path to the bundle given the form name. It first finds out the the bundle name for the given form and then calls the discover resource which returns the path to the required bundle. uiContext name String

      • applyCaching

        public static java.lang.String applyCaching(java.lang.String path,
                                            java.lang.String cache,
                                            SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method applies cache logic on any given path. Returned path is mapped to SCUICacheHandlerServlet which interprets this URL and sets proper headers and modified time. The path returned will always begin with a "/", and all the "\" will be replaced with "/". path cache can have one of 'always', 'never' or 'normal' uiContext new path SCUICacheHandlerServlet

      • isCookieDisabled

        public static boolean isCookieDisabled(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Utility that checks if cookies are disabled by checking the parameter 'isCookieDisabled' passed in request or context parameter 'cookie.disabled' set in web.xml. If set to True or T or Yes or Y it returns true otherwise false. Once set to true the value is stored in the session. request of type HttpServletRequest to access the request parameter. boolean true if cookies are disabled in the browser; otherwise false

                                        java.lang.String paramName,

      • getCookiesAsJson

        public static java.lang.String getCookiesAsJson(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Utility to convert cookie map in the session to JSON object. uiContext to access the session String in JSON format {'name1':'value1','name2':'value2',...}

      • getExceptionAsJson

        public static java.lang.String getExceptionAsJson(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method gets a JSON response format for the exception in the request. If there is no exception in the request it returns a response with success as true. It also checks if the stacktrace permission is there if so returns the stack trace as String. uiContext of the type SCUIContext String containing the exception in Json response

      • hasStackTracePermission

        public static boolean hasStackTracePermission(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method checks if the user has permission to view the stack trace. If a resourceId is given as context param in the web.xml, then the stack trace for the exception is based on the permission. If resourceId is not given then the stacktrace of the exception is shown to all. uiContext of the type SCUIContext true if the user has permission to view stack trace; otherwise false.

      • getJSLibraryDefinitions

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getJSLibraryDefinitions(SCUIContext uiContext)
        Return JS Library definitions in expected JSON format for current application. Any library with property allowDynamicLoad set to false will not be included. uiContext JS library definitions in expected JSON format.

      • getJSFilesForLibray

        public static java.util.ArrayList getJSFilesForLibray(java.lang.String libName,
                                                      SCUIContext uiContext)
        Returns list containing path of js file for given JS library name. If not in dev mode, list will contain one entry which would be the path of the localized minified file for the library.
        On the other hand if application is in dev mode, list will contain individual files for that library. All the entries will be made localized.
        In case of non-dev mode, if minified file does not exist, individual file list will be returned.
        Return list will contain all the javascript files from dependency libraries. libName uiContext arrayList containing paths of JS files for the library. #getJSFilesForLibray(String, boolean, SCUIContext)

      • getJSFilesForLibray

        public static java.util.ArrayList getJSFilesForLibray(java.lang.String libName,
                                                      boolean dependencies,
                                                      SCUIContext uiContext)
        Returns list containing path of js file for given JS library name. If not in dev mode, list will contain one entry which would be the path of the localized minified file for the library.
        On the other hand if application is in dev mode, list will contain individual files for that library. All the entries will be made localized.
        In case of non-dev mode, if minified file does not exist, individual file list will be returned.
        Return list will also contain javascript files from dependency libraries if dependency parameter is passed as true. libName dependencies true if javascript files from dependency libraries should be included. uiContext arrayList containing paths of JS files.

        On the other hand if application is in dev mode, list will contain individual files for that library. All the entries will be made localized.
        In case of non-dev mode, if minified file does not exist, individual file list will be returned.
        Return list will contain all javascript files from dependency libraries. lib uiContext arrayList containing paths of JS files for the library. #getJSFilesForLibray(SCUIJSLibraryMetaData, boolean, SCUIContext)

      • getJSFilesForLibray

        public static java.util.ArrayList getJSFilesForLibray(SCUIJSLibraryMetaData lib,
                                                      boolean dependencies,
                                                      SCUIContext uiContext)
        Returns list containing path of js file for given JS library name. If not in dev mode, list will contain one entry which would be the path of the localized minified file for the library.
        On the other hand if application is in dev mode, list will contain individual files for that library. All the entries will be made localized.
        In case of non-dev mode, if minified file does not exist, individual file list will be returned.
        Return list will also contain javascript files from dependency libraries if dependency parameter is passed as true. lib dependencies true if javascript files from dependency libraries should be included. uiContext arrayList containing paths of JS files.

      • isURIPatternInContextParam

        public static boolean isURIPatternInContextParam(java.lang.String uri,
                                                 java.lang.String key,
                                                 SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method reads context parameter with name as [key], [key]-endswith, [key]-regex and matches them with the passed URI, and returns true if any match was found.
        Note: uri given as param should not have context path in it. uri uri to be looked for in context parameter value. Should not contain context path. key key identifier for which URI would be matched. uiContext true if uri pattern matches context param

      • setRequestLogEnabled

        public static void setRequestLogEnabled(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                        boolean reqLogNeeded)
                                 throws SCUIException

If context param is not set to true this method will throw a runtime exception SCUIException. uiContext is of the type SCUIContext reqLogNeeded user request to turn on or off the requestLogEnable variable SCUIException is a RuntimeException.

        SCUIException
